content.html: Twitter Engineer: I resigned because they wanted me to work 80 hours making a bluecheck system that lets anyone pose as Burger King and say the Burger King demands droit du seigneur Reply Guy: Good riddance slacker. I could do your job. I am pretty good at Microsoft Office
content.value:
Twitter Engineer: I resigned because they wanted me to work 80 hours making a bluecheck system that lets anyone pose as Burger King and say the Burger King demands droit du seigneur

Reply Guy: Good riddance slacker. I could do your job. I am pretty good at Microsoft Office
